main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Danville, Virginia, on June 12, 1959, described as glowing and silvery, hovering over the observer's car before vanishing.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 20 to 30 feet in diameter,The observation lasted for about 15-20 minutes,The object made no sound during the sighting,The witness was a life-long student of aviation and had been interested in UFOs for many years,The initial sighting was called to attention by the witness's 10-year-old daughter.
witness description: A life-long aviation enthusiast and his 10-year-old daughter.
